functions.name: castEpochTimestampNumberAsDatetime
functions.description: Takes an Epoch timestamp as a number and converts it to datetime

functions.name: castUserIdListToPersonList
functions.displayName: Cast User ID Text List to Person List
functions.description: Casts an array of integer User IDs to an array of person objects

functions.name: castUserIdNumListToPersonList
functions.displayName: Cast User ID Number List to Person List
functions.description: Casts an array of integer User IDs to an array of person objects

functions.name: castUserIdNumToPerson
functions.displayName: Cast User ID Number to Person
functions.description: Casts an integer User ID to a person object

functions.name: castUserIdToPerson
functions.displayName: Cast User ID Text to Person
functions.description: Casts a string User ID to a person object

functions.name: concatNumList
functions.description: Concatenate an array of integers into a string separated by specified separator

functions.name: deleteAccessToken
functions.description: Deletes/revokes an API access token by ID

functions.name: deletePageAndCards
functions.description: Deletes all cards on a given page then deletes the page

functions.name: getGroupMembers
functions.example:
### Input 
 - **groupId**: integer
### Output 
 - **members**: 
  ``` 
[
   {
      "type": string,
      "id": string,
      "displayName": string
   }
]
```

functions.name: getListOfNumbersLength
functions.description: Returns the length of a list (array) of numbers (integers)

functions.name: getNumberFromList
functions.description: Returns a number (integer) at a specified index from a list (array) of numbers (integers)

functions.name: getPerson
functions.description: Returns a full user object from a person object

functions.name: getUsersByGrant
functions.description: Get users that have a grant (or grants by comma separated values)
functions.example:
### Input 
 - **grant**: string
### Output 
 - **users**: 
  ``` 
[
   {
      "id": string,
      "displayName": string,
      "avatarKey": string,
      "email": string
   }
]
```

functions.name: updateManager
functions.description: Updates reportsTo field (manager) of a user
